description: Return size of an array or string

Count drop.description: Return count of all items in drop or collection (integer)

Email drop.description: Return email address of person or user (String)

First drop.description: Return first item in drop or collection (integer)

ID drop.description: Return unique identifier of account or mapping list (String)

Name drop.description: Return name of item. If applied to an array, will return the name of the first item in the array (String)

Value drop.description: Return (sum) value of the drop or collection (Number)

Custom drop.description: Return custom drops with placeholder namespace and key

Accounts drop (with options).description: All drops under the accounts drop

Starred accounts drop.description: Return all starred accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Starred accounts drop (with options).description: All drops under the starred drop

Assets accounts drop.description: Return all assets accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Assets accounts drop (with options).description: All drops under the assets drop

Liabilities accounts drop.description: Return all liabilities accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Liabilities accounts drop (with options).description: All drops under the liabilities drop

Revenue accounts drop.description: Return all revenue accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Revenue accounts drop (with options).description: All drops under the revenue drop

Expenses accounts drop.description: Return all expenses accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Expenses accounts drop (with options).description: All drops under the expenses drop

Income accounts drop.description: Return all income accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Income accounts drop (with options).description: All drops under the income drop

Equity accounts drop.description: Return all equity accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Equity accounts drop (with options).description: All drops for the equity drop

Accounts credit value drop.description: Return sum of credit value of all selected accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Accounts debit value drop.description: Return sum of debit value of all selected accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

First - account drop (with options).description: All drops under the account drop

Accounts drop including zeros.description: Return accounts drop, including accounts with a zero balance, from all selected accounts - must use with variable of type accounts

Accounts drop including zeros (with opti.description: All drops for the equity drop

Pnl rounding difference drop.description: Return exact PnL rounding difference when using the core rounding functionality - must use with variable of type accounts

BS rounding difference drop.description: Return exact BS rounding difference when using the core rounding functionality - must use with variable of type accounts

PnL rounding account.description: Return the account used for PnL rounding

BS rounding account.description: Return the account used for BS rounding

Return (account) values in millions.description: Return value of the individual account drops in the selected accounts drop in millions - must use with variable of type accounts

Return (account) values in thousands.description: Return value of the individual account drops in the selected accounts drop in thousands - must use with variable of type accounts

Company drop (with options).description: Return all drops under the Company drop

Dimension/company set drop.description: Returns drop of dimensions/companies in an analytical/consolidation file (drop)

Company form drop.description: Return company form from company settings (String)

Company type drop.description: Return company type from company settings (String)

Company country code drop.description: Return country code, based on country (String)

Company currency drop.description: Return company currency, based on country (String)

Company file code drop.description: Return file number from company settings (String)

Company locales drop.description: Return available languages from company settings (array)

Company periods per year drop.description: Returns 1,4,12 depending on the reporting frequency (integer)

Company postal code drop.description: Return post code from company settings (String)

Company VAT identifier drop.description: Return VAT identifier from company settings (String)

People drop (with options).description: All drops under the People drop

Directors drops (wuth options).description: All drops under the special Directors drop

Shareholders drops (with options).description: All drops under the special Shareholders drop

First - person drop (with options).description: All drops under the person drop

Active as directors filter.description: Return all active directors - must use with special directors drop

Active as directors filter (with options.description: All drops under the active as directors filter

Active as directors on filter.description: Return all active directors on a certain date - must use with special directors drop

Active as directors on filter (with opti.description: All drops under the active as directors on filter

Period drop (with options).description: Return all drops under the Period drop

Accounts drop.description: Return all accounts in the period - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Account mapping list drop (with optiont).description: All drops under the Account Mapping List drop

Marketplace template id drop.description: Return id of Mapping List on the marketplace - must use with variable of type period (integer)

Adjustments drop.description: Return all adjustments in the period - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Bookyear index method.description: Return index of the bookyear in the period (first year is 1) - must use with variable of type period (integer)

Calendar years method.description: Return an array of all calendar years in the fiscal year - must use with variable of type period (array)

Directors drop.description: Return all directors in the period - must use with variable of type period (special drop)

End date drop.description: Return end date of the period - must use with variable of type period (date)

Exists method.description: Return true if the period exists - must use with variable of type period (boolean)

Fiscal year drop.description: Return fiscal year of the period - must use with variable of type period (string)

Is first year method.description: Return true if the period is the first book year of client file - must use with variable of type period (boolean)

Month end dates method.description: Return an array of all month end dates in the fiscal year - must use with variable of type period (array)

People drop.description: Return all people in the period - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Reconciliations drop.description: Return all reconciliations in the period - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Reports drop.description: Return collection of Reports for the period - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Report drop.description: Return specific report for the period - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Shareholders drop.description: Return all shareholders in the period - must use with variable of type period (special drop)

Start date drop.description: Return start date of the period - must use with variable of type period (date)

Year end drop.description: Return period drop of period at end of fiscal year - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Year end date drop.description: Return end date of the fiscal year - must use with variable of type period (date)

Year start date drop.description: Return start date of the fiscal year - must use with variable of type period (date)

Minus period/year.description: Return period before current period by a set number of periods or year - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Plus period/year.description: Return period after current period by a set number of periods or year - must use with variable of type period (drop)

Reconciliations drop (with options).description: All drops under the Reconciliations drop

Starred reconciliations drop.description: Return all starred reconciliations - must use with variable of type reconciliations (drop)

Starred reconciliations drop (with optio.description: All drops under the Starred Reconciliation drop

User drops (with options).description: Return all drops under the User drop
